metadata.title: CVE-2017-7784 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur when reading an image observer during frame reconstruction after the observer has been freed. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.3, Firefox ESR < 52.3, and Firefox < 55.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs38 contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.2+build1-0ubuntu4').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:52.4.0+build1-0ubuntu2').
